text:
December 26 1968
Mr. Joseph C. Dine
Information Consultant
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
545 Madison Avenue
New York, New York 10022
Dear Joe:
It was good to talk with you via phone on Tuesday.
I hope your plans for a Washington trip materialize
and that we*11 have an opportunity to talk about
CPB, radio &nd related matters.
Will you please put us on your mailing list for
all Corporation news releases and related inforÂ¬
mation which will be disseminated.
Best wishes for the holiday season and 1969.
Sincerely,
Robert A. Mott
